fieldMap.label: Field mapping
fieldMap.helpText: Build a JSON object. The object should be in the format option_value: [array of field ids' to act on] for example: {'custom_field_21631456': {'cat':['custom_field_21875871','custom_field_21865183','custom_field_21745801'], 'dog':['custom_field_22103126','custom_field_21613267'], 'dolphin': ['custom_field_280865', 'custom_field_20295661'], 'the_fish': ['custom_field_279466']}, 'custom_field_279466':{'asdf':['custom_field_21651413'], 'xfer_to_a': [], 'fire_to_new_page': []}}

errors.title: An error occurred
errors.message: Please try the previous action again.
errors.data: Ticket data could not be read.
